trans-unit.source: Represents a button that enables the user to switch between the different <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> modes within the property grid .
trans-unit.target: 表示使用户能够切换不同的按钮<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>在属性网格的模式。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> class.
Determines what type of <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode"></xref> to display upon receipt of a <xref:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs> event.
trans-unit.target: 确定哪种类型的<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainerEditMode"></xref>以显示收到<xref:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs>事件。</xref:System.Windows.MouseButtonEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty> has changed (or gained or lost) its owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> and if that is <xref:System.Boolean.True>, sets up the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> to be the mode to switch to.
trans-unit.target: 检查是否<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty>已更改 （或获得或失去） 其所属<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>并且如果为<xref:System.Boolean.True>，设置<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>切换到的模式。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> </xref:System.Boolean.True> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> </xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.OwningPropertyContainerProperty>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, means that the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> will be calculated automatically to match the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode*> of the owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，当<xref:System.Boolean.True>，意味着<> *1> 将自动计算，以匹配<> *1> 所属<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>的</xref:System.Boolean.True>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> property.
trans-unit.target: 否则，要切换到的模式将基于<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>属性。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> will switch automatically to the edit mode of its <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref>将自动切换到编辑模式的其<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>

trans-unit.source: Registers the dependency property which, when <xref:System.Boolean.True>, means that the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> will be calculated automatically to match the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer.ActiveEditMode*> of the owning <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 注册依赖属性的当<xref:System.Boolean.True>，意味着<> *1> 将自动计算，以匹配<> *1> 所属<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>的</xref:System.Boolean.True>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the mode to switch to will be based on the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*> property.
trans-unit.target: 否则，要切换到的模式将基于<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>属性。</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton.TargetEditMode*>

trans-unit.source: The edit mode to switch to when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 编辑模式时要切换到<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref>单击。

trans-unit.source: Registers the dependency property that gets or sets the targeted mode when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 注册的依赖项属性，可获取或设置目标的模式时<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.EditModeSwitchButton"></xref>单击。
